divs: sighting detailsi was sitting in the garden with my husband, my 13 year old son and my sister inlaw.there was a summer thunderstorm, and we were watching it.no rain, a lot oflightning.on our left in a hole in the clouds suddenly a formation of lightballsappeared, flying in a straight line in front of us from left to rightdirection.it\they dissapeared into the clouds after maybe 30 sec.the lightsdidnt move between eachother, as if they were attached to eachother, as if itwas 1 object.they were glowing white really round lights...different from starsor planes.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Carpentras
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: about 15 light balls flying in formation
